vseh = n*(n+1)//2

hit = vseh//2

def posible(hit, n):
    nums = set()
    maks = n
    while hit > 0:
        if maks > hit:
            maks = hit 
        hit -= maks
        nums.add(maks)
        maks -= 1
        if maks <= 0:
            break
    return nums
